title: mAdam mummAri
sahitya:
mAdam mummAri pozhigavE (x2) ulagellAm mangalap-payir shezhikkavE jagadIshvariyE


anupallavi

  tIdellAm tIrkkavE uzhaittellArum kSEmamAga vAzhgavE aruT-poduvil


caraNam    varumaiyum aDimai shei maDamaiyum sirumaiyum vanjamum konjamum inri un makkaL
orumaiyum uNmaiyum uyar malai tavazhginra aruvi pOl anbu koND-aruL arasANDiDa
